name: The Puzzly Adventures of Willy in Search for his Cat
name_original: The Puzzly Adventures of Willy in Search for his Cat
description:
Cut your way through different puzzles, explore a handcrafted region, reveal all the unexpected secrets! Take part in this adventure and try to find the mysterious cat!

The game is fully developed by Emanuele Cadamuro using Construct 3. This is the very first game I've ever finished and published!

This project was made as part of Pixel Game Jam 2022, from March 12th to 16th. All assets are made by me. Music and sound are copyright free media downloaded from opengameart.org.

Music used: - https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure - https://opengameart.org/content/fun-adventure - https://opengameart.org/content/adventure-intro-title-cinematic-epic - https://opengameart.org/content/happy-adventure-loop
